Containers.Name: DVB-Drivers
Containers.Description: This Plugin will install all necessary modules and dependencies for to get your DVB Cards working (currently you have the choice between DigitalDevices, LibreELEC and XboxOne-USB DVB drivers on the settings page). ATTENTION: Please note that you have to update your 'go' file in order to load the module for your DVB card on system startup, for more information see the DVB Plugin page after you installed the plugin.
